snippet: Justice Stephen G. Breyer joins a group limited to 50 French citizens and 12 foreign associated members.
abstract: Supreme Court Justice Stephen G Breyer is inducted as foreign member of France's Academie des Sciences Morales et Politiques, one of five academies of Institut de France.
lead_paragraph: Justice Stephen G. Breyer joins a group limited to 50 French citizens and 12 foreign associated members.

headline.seo: Justice Breyer Inducted Into French Academy
headline.main: Justice Breyer Inducted Into French Academy
